Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: D - Glucarates were effective against renal damage induced by peptide antibiotics as well as various aminoglycoside antibitocis .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal damage |
| damage induced by peptide antibiotics |
| damage induced by various aminoglycoside antibiotics |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal damage |
| damage induced by peptide antibiotics |
| damage induced by various aminoglycoside antibiotics |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "renal damage" and "damage induced by peptide antibiotics" as well as "damage induced by various aminoglycoside antibiotics". These entities clearly refer to diseases or health conditions. Therefore, they are the valid entities to include in the table. Other entities such as "Glucarates" and "were effective against" are not diseases and should not be included.
